content_parts.content:
Line panel actions

You can delete a line directly from the line panel.

Main list row actions

For sales and purchasing documents, you can perform several key actions from the main list to save time.

Additional actions include:

  • Allocate
  • Deallocate

Additional date columns for main list

For sales orders, you can display the Delivery date column in the main list.

For purchase orders, you can display the Earliest expected date column in the main list.
